snippet: Kirsti Merritt hit a three-run homer, and Florida (55-12) defeated Alabama, 6-3, in Oklahoma City to win its first N.C.A.A. softball championship.
abstract: Florida beats Alabama, 6-3, to win its first NCAA softball championship.
lead_paragraph: Kirsti Merritt hit a three-run homer, and Florida (55-12) defeated Alabama, 6-3, in Oklahoma City to win its first N.C.A.A. softball championship.

headline.main: Florida Wins Its First N.C.A.A. Softball Title
headline.print_headline: Florida Wins Its First N.C.A.A. Title
